Work Fragment Strings Treat Treat a cow Tap to add a Lot. This cow is dead Mark as dead Tag number Drugs Given Edit drugs given This cow is marked dead already Add Memo Mark as dead You have medicated this cow You need to add some drugs first. To do so, go back to the main screen, select \'More\' in the bottom right corner, then select Manage Drugs. There are no medicated cows in this lot. Tap the + button to add one. Treat This pen is empty Fill out the blanks below to continue. Lot Info Lot description Cattle Info Add to pen
%1$d unit of %2$s
%1$d units of %2$s
This cow has been medicated This cow is dead and has been medicated Data to Upload Edit
Feed Fragment Strings Feed Your pens will show here. No cattle in this Pen. Call Total Fed Left To Feed Today 0 Amount Fed Add a Lot
Feed Reports Feed Reports Ration RATION No feed in this date range
Report Strings Reports This is where the reports for each of your lots will be.
Move Strings Move No pens or lots found. \n \n This is where lots are moved from one pen to another. Merge Lots Reorder lots Only one lot can be under one pen.
Lots Lot description Customer Name LOT REPORTS Current head Total head Head days Death loss Drugs used No drugs used Drug Reports Feed Reports Cattle received No cattle have been received. Archive this lot Yes dead Are you sure? You are about to delete a group of cattle. You can not undo this action. Add load Edit cattle added
More Fragment Strings More Add and Edit Pens Add new pen Add and Edit Drugs Add and Edit Rations Archives Settings
Cows Head count
Drugs Given Reports START DATE END DATE Last 24 Hrs Last 30 Days All No drugs given in this date range Drug Reports: %1$s
Manage Pens No saved pens. \n \n Please add one to use full functionality. Pen Name Pen:
Manage Drugs Add drug No saved drugs. \n \n Please add one to use full functionality. Drugs You need to add some drugs first. Go to the navigation drawer and select Drugs Drug name Default amount given No drugs given Amount Given Default given: Edit drug given to cow %1$s
Manage Rations Add Ration Edit Ration No saved rations. \n \n Please add one to use full functionality. Ration Name Please add a ration to use this feature
Archives No lots have been archived. Archived reports Are you sure you want to archive lot? This action cannot be undone. You will not be able to edit these reports after they are archived. You will be able to view this lot\'s reports under Archives.
